Name: eia : A short story
About the game: You Become A Boy and Run Endlessly. You have to jump over obstacles and go back when you hit a wall and find the right way. There is nothing in both hands, and sharp thorns and dizzying cliffs stand in the way, With will and quick wit, you can easily get away with it. The game consists of several chapters and dozens of stages contained within it. The boy is constantly running forward, and you have to lead him to his destination only by jumping. You can jump over obstacles or acquire keys by jumping. You sometimes have to jump into the portal or get the right timing for the safe land between thorny paths. I hope you will be a great guide to the boy's short story.
